## Summary Statistics

There are `r nrow(mtcars)` cars included in the analysis. The mean mpg across the `r nrow(mtcars)` cars is `r mean(mtcars$mpg)`.

## Examination of Car Weight vs MPG

```{r}
plot(x = mtcars$wt, y = mtcars$mpg)
```
